column4: 5.10 comse with 1.07 version of firefox but 1.5 is the newest, how do you update it?
We're still waiting on the Breezy build of 1.5.
If you want you can still get it from http://www.getfirefox.com, but most people are content to wait.
I believe you just need to edit the string defaults to defaults,umask=000 on the line for the drive in question.

You could use other numbers there if you want; 000 allow full permissions for everyone.  The numbers for umask are just the opposite for the file permissions ones, so umask=000 equates to perm.s of 777.
You'll have to umount and mount it again.
Make sure to say umount not unmount.

They would usually be named installer, install, or something obvious.  Otherwise, it doesn't really look any different.
